official_title: Concurrent resolution that the members of the Chamber of Commerce of Frankenmuth, Mich., be commended.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the members of the Chamber of Commerce of Frankenmuth, Michigan, be commended for their contribution to the economic welfare of the nation.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution that the members of the Chamber of Commerce of Frankenmuth, Mich., be commended.
